name: Statue of Liberty
description: Be transported to one of the world�s most exciting cities as you build this LEGO� Architecture Skyline Collection model of Singapore (21057) � no passport required. Enjoy quality time recreating Marina Bay Sands, the OCBC Centre, One Raffles Place, Lau Pa Sat food market, The Fullerton Hotel Singapore and Supertree Grove at Gardens by the Bay. Add LEGO elements representing the Singapore River and trees to complete the biggest, most complex LEGO city skyline model to date.
